ValidationRule.description: User cannot move stage to Close Pending if PO Required field is blank on the Account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "PF Super User", ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Close Pending"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Account.PO_Required__c,"" ), ISPICKVAL( Account.Legal_Entity__c ,"" ), INCLUDES( Account.Compliance_Designations__c ,"") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: User cannot move stage to Close Pending if PO Required, Legal Entity, Compliance Designation field is blank on the Account .
